• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly

• Camera for translating text via the camera

Zákony pro lidi – přehled české legislativy na dosah ruky

Zákony pro lidi jsou praktickou aplikací, která vám umožní přístup ke všem aktuálním právním předpisům České republiky. Ať už jste právní profesionál, student nebo někdo, kdo se jen potřebuje rychle zorientovat v české legislativě, tato aplikace vám poskytne všechny nezbytné nástroje pro snadné vyhledávání a porozumění právním textům.

Proč si vybrat Zákony pro lidi?

Zákony pro lidi vám zjednoduší přístup k platným právním předpisům a nabízí snadnou orientaci v českém právním systému. Můžete prohledávat nejen zákony, vyhlášky a nařízení vlády, ale také mezinárodní smlouvy, kterými je Česká republika vázána, což vám poskytne úplný přehled o právních povinnostech státu.

Klíčové funkce aplikace:

• Aktuální právní předpisy: Získejte přístup ke všem zákonům, nařízením a vyhláškám ČR od roku 1945 do současnosti.
• Mezinárodní smlouvy: Přístup k mezinárodním smlouvám, kterými je Česká republika právně vázána.
• Rychlé a přesné vyhledávání: Vyhledávání podle názvu, čísla nebo klíčových slov.
• Pravidelné aktualizace: Legislativní změny jsou reflektovány okamžitě po jejich zveřejnění.
• Offline režim: Stáhněte si potřebné předpisy a mějte je k dispozici i bez připojení k internetu.
• Intuitivní uživatelské rozhraní: Snadno ovladatelné rozhraní, které je přizpůsobeno jak právním odborníkům, tak laické veřejnosti.

Pro koho je aplikace určena?

• Právníci a právní profesionálové: Rychlý přístup k aktuálním předpisům přímo na mobilu vám pomůže při každodenní práci.
• Studenti práv a právní vědy: Perfektní nástroj pro učení a přípravu na zkoušky.
• Podnikatelé a firmy: Získejte rychlý přehled o právních předpisech, které mohou ovlivnit vaše podnikání.
• Veřejnost: Potřebujete rychle zjistit, jaké právní předpisy platí v souvislosti s vaší situací? Aplikace je pro vás ideálním řešením.

Bezplatná verze a Zákony pro lidi Plus

Aplikace je dostupná zdarma s možností budoucího upgradu na Zákony pro lidi Plus, která nabízí rozšířené funkce pro profesionální uživatele. Verze Plus zahrnuje například pokročilejší nástroje pro vyhledávání a další funkce, které vám umožní pracovat s legislativou ještě efektivněji.

Jak aplikace funguje?

Po stažení aplikace získáte plný přístup k databázi všech českých právních předpisů a mezinárodních smluv. Jednoduše vyhledejte konkrétní zákon nebo právní úpravu a aplikace vám okamžitě poskytne aktuální verzi předpisu. Můžete si předpisy uložit pro pozdější použití v offline režimu, což zajišťuje, že máte legislativu k dispozici vždy, když ji potřebujete.

Stáhněte si Zákony pro lidi a mějte legislativu vždy po ruce!

Aplikace Zákony pro lidi vám poskytuje spolehlivý a rychlý přístup k platným právním předpisům a mezinárodním smlouvám, které jsou klíčové pro každodenní život i odbornou praxi.

Translate text, voice, and photos in 320 different languages. Featuring a keyboard translator and live voice translator.

Whether you need to translate for travel, work, study, or everyday conversation, Translate Now is your ultimate AI-powered language translator. Break language barriers instantly with Translate Now’s multilingual translation tools, making every interaction seamless.

Key Features

▶ Hands-Free Voice Translator for Real-Time Conversations
Effortlessly overcome language barriers with a real-time, hands-free voice translator. Simply speak into your device for instant two-way translation and enjoy multilingual conversations with ease.
▶ Photo Translator for Instant Translation
Translate menus, signs, and pictures instantly with your camera. Just snap a photo for a real-time translation—perfect for travel and navigating world languages.
▶ Keyboard Translator for Multilingual Chat
Type in your native language and send translations live in 60 different languages within any app for effortless messaging.
▶ AI Translator for Instant Text Translation
Translate text with AI-enhanced accuracy, phonetic support, and context-aware translation in 320+ languages.
▶ AR Live Translator for an Immersive Local Experience
Use your camera and augmented reality to translate live, making language learning and travel more intuitive.
▶ AI-Powered Dictionary & Grammar Assistant
Expand your vocabulary with contextual meanings and receive real-time grammar corrections for more precise translations.

Translate Now offers various AI Translation Models, Phrasebook, Watch App, Translation Extension, Offline Mode, Dark Mode, Siri Shortcuts, Interactive Widgets, and SharePlay.

Download Translate Now, your ultimate language translator! Experience the power of language translation at your fingertips. Text, speak, and translate effortlessly between French, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Italian, Arabic, German, Urdu, Thai, Korean, Portuguese, Punjabi, Polish, and more!

Noona is a marketplace for services and experiences. 

In Iceland (our home country), "Noona" means "now". 

Our goal is to help you book all of your appointments in a single app, without having to make a single phone call, whenever and wherever. So why not now? 

Whether you need a hair cut or a beauty session, a psychologist or a chiropractor, a dentist or a massage - or if your dog just really needs grooming - we've got you covered. 

- Discover the best service providers near you.
- Add your favorites to your home screen for easy access later on.
- See all of your upcoming appointments in one place.
- Move or cancel appointments without making a phone call.

It's a win-win for you and the ones you are booking with. You save time and don't need to make any phone calls, and they don't have to pick up the phone while they are busy with a client (how annoying is that, right?)

Join the revolution today and start booking all your appointments on Noona. 

It's free, and always will be.

Welcome to the world of simplified crafting: YarnPal is the app that brings your knitting and crochet skills to life in no time. Simply snap a photo, follow step-by-step instructions, and create personalised projects—anytime, anywhere.

YarnPal is your daily companion for knitting and crochet, giving you easy access to tutorials, patterns, and design inspiration. Try it now with our free trial and unlock a world of stitches, motifs, and creative possibilities—perfect for both beginners and experienced makers!

What Can YarnPal Do?
1. Snap a Photo, Learn a Stitch
Seen a stitch you love? Take a photo, and YarnPal will tell you its name and show you how to do it. Picking up new stitches is quick and easy!
2. Step-by-Step Pattern Help
Stuck on a pattern? Upload it to YarnPal. The app will break it down for you and help you keep track of your place as you work through each row. You can even adjust the pace to suit your needs.
3. Creative AI Tools
Get Pattern Ideas: Lacking inspiration? Let YarnPal’s AI suggest new patterns for scarves, shawls, and other creative projects.
Fix Mistakes: Made an error? YarnPal can spot and help you fix it.
Understand Charts and Symbols: Struggling with pattern charts? YarnPal explains the symbols so you can follow along with confidence.
4. Ask the AI Coach
Have a question about knitting or crochet? Ask the AI Coach anything! From basic stitches to advanced techniques, get instant answers and helpful advice.
5. Personalise Your Projects
Want to make something unique? Adjust sizes, styles, and patterns to match your ideas. YarnPal helps you create truly one-of-a-kind pieces.

Who Is YarnPal For?
1. Beginners
New to knitting or crochet? YarnPal makes learning simple, with clear steps and helpful tips to get you started with confidence.
2. Hobbyists
Already enjoy knitting or crochet? Use YarnPal to try out new tools, tackle tricky patterns, and customise your projects. Take your craft to the next level!
3. Experts
Even for advanced crafters, YarnPal saves you time and sparks fresh ideas. Design better patterns, fix issues efficiently, and stay motivated.

Why Use YarnPal?
With YarnPal, crafting is:
Easy: Learn stitches and patterns stress-free.
Fun: Get creative and try something new.
Organised: Easily keep track of projects and progress.

Join the YarnPal Community
Connect with knitters and crocheters from around the world to share ideas, showcase your work, and get inspired. With YarnPal, you’ll never craft alone.

Start Your YarnPal Journey Today!
Download YarnPal now and see what you can create. Whether it’s your first simple scarf or an intricate piece of your own design, YarnPal will guide you every step of the way. Let’s make something amazing together!

Explore your roots, find new relatives, and make amazing discoveries with genealogical search tools and an intuitive family tree builder. Join our global community of users to map your ancestors and family history effortlessly.

LiveMemory™
Make your memories come to life as AI-powered videos with LiveMemory™! Turn photos into video clips with AI-powered photo animation and relive your favorite moments. Animate entire family photos and see your memories reimagined in lifelike videos. Our AI video generator creates animated memories that bring photos to life. Share on social media and amaze your family and friends!

Build Your Family Tree
Start your family tree by entering a few names, and MyHeritage will do the rest. Our matching technologies for genealogical research will automatically find new information for you in our diverse collection of 81 million family trees built by users all over the world, and in our huge database of 21 billion historical records. Watch your family history come to life and make fascinating discoveries with this family tree maker app.

Make Instant Family History Discoveries
MyHeritage’s genealogical search features can easily match your family tree to other family trees and historical records to provide you with meaningful new insights about your ancestors. Enrich your family tree with MyHeritage’s powerful search and matching technologies:

Smart Matches™
A unique technology that automatically matches your family tree to other family trees, revealing new information about your family origins.
Record Matches: an innovative technology that finds new information about your ancestors in our global collection of historical records.
Instant Discoveries™: a useful feature that adds entire branches and photos to your family tree in one click.

Find Your Ancestors in Historical Records
Explore your family history in MyHeritage’s vast database of more than 33 billion historical records from around the world. The historical record collections include vital records (birth, marriage, and death certificates) from 66 countries; census and immigration records; gravestone and burial records; and much more.

MyHeritage DNA
Locked inside your DNA is your unique ethnic makeup. The test consists of a simple cheek swab and reveals your genetic heritage across 2,114 geographic regions — more than any other test. It also matches you to relatives you never knew existed in our DNA database of 9 million people. View your DNA results on the app; they’re private and secure, and will never be shared or sold.

Deep Nostalgia™
Have you ever dreamed of bringing historical family photos to life? With MyHeritage’s Deep Nostalgia™ feature, your historical family photos will come to life and you’ll see your ancestors’ faces move! Deep Nostalgia™ uses AI technology to breathe new life into historical photos and recreate moments from your family history. Pull out those photo albums and discover your ancestry as you connect to cherished family memories and trace history across generations.

Enrich Your Family Tree with Photos
Capture and share your family memories, old and new. Scan your family photos directly from the app and use our AI-based photo tools to bring your family history to life. Repair scratched or damaged photos with Photo Repair, colorize your black and white photos, and bring blurry faces into focus with the MyHeritage Photo Enhancer. Record the stories behind your family photos with the Photo Storyteller™ and preserve them for generations to come.

Download MyHeritage today to uncover your roots with an all-in-one family tree app, photo animator, and ancestry search tool.

Night Sky is a powerful AI personal planetarium.

Quickly identify stars, planets, constellations and satellites above by simply holding your iPhone, iPad or Apple Watch to the Night Sky!  This is all done magically.  Whether you’re looking for a constellation, or the International Space Station, let Night Sky direct you to it, then explore the object in AR!

FEATURE SET: 

- NIGHT SKY + AURA (Night Sky + Aura Subscription required) - Your Personal AI Super Astronomer!  Ask Night Sky Aura virtually anything about Space and it will know the answer.  Night Sky Aura fully interfaces with features within Night Sky, to direct you to objects you’re interested in, provide information on anything to do with astronomy, or even show you how the sky looks on the other side of the world!  With your own personal AI Super Astronomer right by your side, Night Sky Aura becomes the new natural way to interact with the sky above! 

- SKY TAGS - Make Night Sky yours, by adding personal Sky Tags to the map!  Pin Sky Tags to objects in the sky to save for future reference, and share them via iMessage so others can find them!  Sky Tags can be categorized, and are completely personal to you.  Maybe you want to tag a star as a memorial to someone, or tag something you’d like to observe later that night.  You can even add Astrophotography photos and observation notes to your Sky Tags!  

- CONNECTED STARGAZING (+ Feature) - Connected Stargazing is a revolutionary new feature that utilizes SharePlay in iOS 15.1, allowing you to stargaze with others when you are apart!  Start a FaceTime Audio call with those who you would like to stargaze with, then create a session by adding objects for everyone to find in the sky!

- SPATIAL AUDIO OBJECT NAVIGATION - Using AirPods Pro or AirPods Max, search for an object when automatic sky tracking is on, and Night Sky will make the star, planet or constellation ‘chirp’ in the 360° soundscape, assisting you to navigate to the object with sound!

- AR SKY WINDOW - Erase the ceiling of your bedroom, lounge or classroom with AR!  Night Sky intelligently detects the ceiling or other flat surface in a room, and can make it magically disappear to reveal the sky behind it!  

- BILLIONS OF STARS!  (+ Feature) - Space is vast, so Night Sky has been hyper charged with over 1.7 BILLION STARS streamed from the cloud!  With a new super deep zoom (greater than 10X before), prepare to delve deeper into space than you ever imagined!

- MAPS UI - A clean and familiar interface with Search features including Quick Find, intelligent Night Red Mode, Light Pollution indicator and easy to use menu, prepare to navigate Night Sky quicker than ever before!

- AR PLANETARY PORTALS & AR GRAND ORRERY (+ Features) - Step onto the surface of other planets by placing AR portals around your room!  Or walk around the entire Solar System using the newly refreshed interactive Grand Orrery!

- NIGHT SKY WATCH AR - Night Sky magically comes to life on Apple Watch, with Glass Constellations, Red Vision, and Night Sky Live Tours - all on your wrist! 

- AR OBJECT EXPLORATION  - Pull Planets, Stars and Constellations out of the sky and look at them in detailed AR!

- NIGHT SKY TOURS (+ Feature):  Get a live sky tour or create your own sky tours for any location and time in the world!  

- NIGHT SKY MINDFULNESS (+ Feature) - A mindfulness stargazing experience adding mindfulness minutes with Apple HealthKit. 

- AND MANY MORE FEATURES! 


Subscription Information: 'Night Sky +' and 'Night Sky + Aura' are available as optional subscriptions. Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage or cancel anytime in your App Store account settings.  Privacy policy: http://www.icandiapps.com/privacy-policy/  Terms and Conditions of Use: http://www.icandiapps.com/terms-conditions/

Moje Auto – Vše o vašem vozidle na jednom místě

Chcete mít přehled o svém voze, ověřit historii vozidla nebo zjistit, kdy končí technická? S aplikací Moje Auto máte všechny důležité informace přehledně a zdarma na dosah ruky.


Hlavní funkce:
• Ověření historie vozidla podle VIN zdarma
• Elektronický technický průkaz (e techničák) – stažení, uložení, tisk, sdílení
• Plná moc k přepisu vozidla – vzor dokumentu vždy po ruce
• Online registr vozidel – STK, SME, interaktivní mapa
• Neomezený počet uložených vozidel
• QR skenování ORV pro rychlé načtení údajů
• Průvodce registrací vozidla krok za krokem
• Kontrola exekucí na vozidlo i na majitele
• Možnost zjistit, zda je vozidlo na leasing


Detailní specifikace vozidla:
• Datum první registrace
• Barva, rozměry, hmotnosti
• Objem motoru, výkon, spotřeba
• Typ paliva, emise, max. rychlost
• Rozměry pneumatik
• Čísla ORV, TP a VIN
• A mnoho dalšího…


Mapy a úřady:
• Mapa STK a SME stanic
• Registrační místa (ORP) s rozšířenou působností


Nákup a prodej vozu:
• Ověření VIN zdarma
• Kontrola počtu najetých km, servisní historie, nehody (ve spolupráci s externími partnery)
• Vzor plné moci a průvodce přepisem
• Zjistěte, zda prodávající není v exekuci


Data z důvěryhodných zdrojů:
Veškeré informace jsou získávány z oficiálních databází Ministerstva dopravy ČR (MDCR.cz).
DIC-o Czech-German and German-Czech off-line dictionary (88000 translations).
